name: GLID (itch)
description:
Prove The World Who You Are......

In GLID you have to find the treasure and to do so you have to cross the 3 worlds. It is an Adventure game full of illusions and mystery.

Plot

Here you are deprived by the World. You need to prove to the World who are you. go find the Treasure, but it's not simple as it seems.........

Features:
  • RPG Action
  • High Graphics
  • 30+ Mystery 
  • 3 Different Worlds
  • Chose ways
  • Unique Traps
  • Adventuristic
  • Single Player
  • Treasure finding
  • Story Mode
  • Hints Available
